item.description:
Kate has so graciously offered to host a pot luck event for the Ethnic Dining Group. This is a chance to honor your own ethnic heritage.

Please bring a main dish, side dish, or dessert from your own ethnic background (or any "ethnic" dish you know how to make). All drinks (bottled water, sodas, beer, wine, some spirits) will be provided.

GUESTS ARE LIMITED TO A MAXIMUM OF 18 DUE TO LIMITED SPACE, SO RSVP QUICKLY BEFORE SPOTS FILL UP!

Also, please indicate what type of dish you plan to bring so that we do not end up with all Baklava or egg rolls.

**Kate has cats, so if you have allergies, be warned.**

Directions:

From I-91 Northbound:
Exit 39 & 41 (Kennedy Rd/Center St Exit) - Continue straight on Archer Rd - Turn right at Hayden Station Rd - House is on left side of the street (green, two-story colonial).

From I-91 Southbound:
Exit 41 & 39 (Center St Exit) - Turn left at South Center St - Turn right at Hayden Station Rd - House is on right side of the street (green, two-story colonial).

Parking/Entrance:
You can drive up the driveway and park in the backyard or sideyard if you arrive early enough to grab a space. There's also street parking. Enter either through the red sidedoor (off the driveway) or the double glass doors (off the backyard).

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Ethnic Pot Luck
